text: Zamani Saul (born 7 March 1972) is a South African politician. He has been the Premier of the Northern Cape and a Member of the Northern Cape Provincial Legislature since May 2019. He is a member of the ruling African National Congress and the party's current provincial chairperson. Saul was formerly the party's provincial secretary and deputy provincial secretary. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at Northern Cape Government *People's Assembly profile Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:South African politicians Category:Northern Cape
title: Zamani Saul
